display_long_description:
Pure, simple poker in completely dynamic casino. Poker VR features multi table tournaments and cash games. Host your own table, customize everything from looks to its identity and everything in between. 
[media]
# Play Multi Table Tournaments in Huge Casinos
[media]
# Play poker like in real life, with both controllers and hand tracking
[media]
# Be who you wanna be, there are 1000s of cosmetics to unlock
[media]
# Make your own table, show off to your friends 
[media]
# Tables exist in the central Poker VR world
